# diffval

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains functions to find, explore and visualize patterns of differential species in phytosociological tables, using the DiffVal1 and TotDiffVal1 indices.

## Installation

You can install the package from GitLab.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_git("https://gitlab.com/point-veg/diffval")
```
